vocabInfos.mediumDef:
People descended from Pathrus(?) of the Egyptians, first mentioned at Gen.10.14; descended from Egypt (H4714); along with Ludim (H3866), Anamim (H6047), Lehabim (H3853), Naphtuhim (H5320), Casluhim (H3695) and Caphtorim (H3732)
§ Pathrusim = see Pathros "region of the south"
inhabitants of Pathros
vocabInfos._es_Definition: habitantes de Patros, descendientes de Misraim
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
帕斯魯細人 这个形容詞 種族名稱在06624字的意思是 參見巴忒羅 "南部地區"
巴忒羅地的居民
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
帕斯鲁细人 这个形容词 种族名称在06624字的意思是 参见巴忒罗 "南部地区"
巴忒罗地的居民
